forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds this morning. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 15C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds this morning. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 42F. WNW winds shifting to SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High near 60F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 61F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
